code: import styles from"./styles.module.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Pagination=_ref=>{let{page,total,limit,setPage}=_ref;const totalPages=Math.ceil(total/limit);const onClick=newPage=>{setPage(newPage+1);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.container,children:totalPages>0&&[...Array(totalPages)].map((val,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onClick(index),className:page===index+1?"".concat(styles.page_btn," ").concat(styles.active):styles.page_btn,children:index+1},index))});};export default Pagination;
